Description: Sandal for the right foot, made of plaited reed and palm leaves or papyrus, with pointed toe, complete with upper, part of toe strap still attached, rest in fragments.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405647001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Bibliographic references: Veldmeijer 2009b / Studies of ancient Egyptian footwear. Technological aspects. Part XII. Fibre shoes (100, 102-103, 105, 112, fig.1c)
